entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023
